description.example: Is he for love or abomination? Is he saint or is he evil? He may be alien to us but mankind to his world — T-WORLD. A step into his world will reveal a young, cheeky, intelligent (some say genius) alien child out for exploration. He speaks, albeit in a language we’ve yet to know. But he learns and mimics all the good (and the sad) in our world of thoughts. Very, very, keen ears, he’s always listening how to make your world just a little better, a little easier. He may look like abomination, but beneath it all, is a curious kind little soul that guides us with his light and encourage us to better ourselves.
